attributes.additional_details: NSPCC stands for National Society for Prevention of Cruelty to Children with helps children who are being abused in many ways. I believe that cruelty to children should STOP. It's wrong to treat children this way and i think they should get more money from the government to help this go on until it stops, they only get money from donations from people like YOU. so please sign my petition to help us and the NSPCC
